name: Car Price Prediction Model
description: Developed a robust regression model to accurately predict car auction prices based on factors like brand, model, manufacturing year, and more, significantly enhancing price estimation processes.

name: Advanced Steganography Pipeline
description: Engineered a sophisticated pipeline utilizing OpenCV for image and audio processing, implementing advanced steganography techniques to securely conceal user identification within multimedia content.

name: Wav-to-Talking Head Animation
description: Designed and implemented a cutting-edge neural network model to generate realistic talking head animations from audio input, leveraging GANs to enhance animation quality.

name: Cardboard QR Code Classifier
description: Built and trained an efficient deep learning model for accurate classification of QR code images on cardboard materials, improving scanning efficiency and reliability.

name: Symptom Clustering NLP Model
description: Developed an advanced NLP model to classify and cluster medical symptoms from textual data, facilitating more accurate and efficient medical diagnoses.

name: Employee Performance Optimization Platform
description: Developed comprehensive end-to-end solutions to optimize employee performance and feedback processes, significantly enhancing productivity and fostering professional growth.

name: End-to-End Data Lakehouse Implementation
description: Led the successful implementation of a complete data lakehouse solution, utilizing cutting-edge technologies for efficient data storage, processing, and visualization, thereby streamlining data analytics workflows.

name: Discord Bot for Fifatargrean Channel
description: Developed a Discord bot to handle 1k users in the Fifatargrean channel, automatically banning scammers and assigning contributor roles to active community members.

name: Fifatargrean Media Share Platform
description: Created a web platform where members can share videos, and streamers can host watch parties, using Python Flask and Discord API with PostgreSQL for backend management.

name: LCKYN Website
description: Developed a website for LCKYN to introduce users to its goals and outlook using modern web technologies like Next.js and React with TypeScript.

name: Own ChatGPT Application
description: Developed an affordable chatbot platform where users can select and switch between OpenAI and Claude models, providing a cheaper alternative to typical LLM subscriptions.
